messages.title: Our pledges to you
messages.content:
We will rebuild the NHS.
We will tackle the crisis in social care.
We will increase the minimum wage to £10 an hour by 2020.
We will take our education crisis seriously.
We will tackle the housing crisis.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will rebuild our NHS, increase funding and improve patient care.
We will tackle the social care crisis to ensure dignity for all.
We will increase the minimum wage to £10 an hour by 2020.
We will take the education crisis seriously, ensuring proper funding and resources.
We will tackle the housing crisis with affordable homes for all.

issues.economy: We will increase the minimum wage to £10 an hour by 2020.
issues.education: We will take our education crisis seriously.
issues.socialWelfare: We will tackle the crisis in social care.

community.content: We will tackle the housing crisis.

leaflet.personalStatement: I want to create a society where all are treated fairly, a society you can be proud of. I share your frustrations with the failings of those behind us. If given the lovely to represent you I commit myself to fighting for all that tightens North East Bedfordshire.

contactInformation.address: The Labour Hall, Walsworth Road, Hitchin, SG4 9SP

quotes.text: I believe in a society that works for the many, not just the few. One where we have access to decent education, a safe home and secure living.

images.caption: Julian out and about in North East Bedfordshire.
